binary_iarchive_impl.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_IARCHIVE_IMPL_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_IARCHIVE_IMPL_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // binary_iarchive_impl.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 #include <istream>
00020 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/archive/basic_binary_iprimitive.hpp>
00022 #include <boost/archive/basic_binary_iarchive.hpp>
00023 
00024 namespace boost { 
00025 namespace archive {
00026 
00027 template<class Archive, class Elem, class Tr>
00028 class binary_iarchive_impl : 
00029     public basic_binary_iprimitive<Archive, Elem, Tr>,
00030     public basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>
00031 {
00032 #ifdef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00033 public:
00034 #else
00035     friend class detail::interface_iarchive<Archive>;
00036     friend class basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>;
00037     friend class load_access;
00038 protected:
00039 #endif
00040     // note: the following should not needed - but one compiler (vc 7.1)
00041     // fails to compile one test (test_shared_ptr) without it !!!
00042     // make this protected so it can be called from a derived archive
00043     template<class T>
00044     void load_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int){
00045         this->basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>::load_override(t, 0L);
00046     }
00047     void init(unsigned int flags){
00048         if(0 != (flags & no_header))
00049             return;
00050         #if ! defined(__MWERKS__)
00051             this->basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>::init();
00052             this->basic_binary_iprimitive<Archive, Elem, Tr>::init();
00053         #else
00054             basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>::init();
00055             basic_binary_iprimitive<Archive, Elem, Tr>::init();
00056         #endif
00057     }
00058     binary_iarchive_impl(
00059         std::basic_streambuf<Elem, Tr> & bsb, 
00060         unsigned int flags
00061     ) :
00062         basic_binary_iprimitive<Archive, Elem, Tr>(
00063             bsb, 
00064             0 != (flags & no_codecvt)
00065         ),
00066         basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>(flags)
00067     {
00068         init(flags);
00069     }
00070     binary_iarchive_impl(
00071         std::basic_istream<Elem, Tr> & is, 
00072         unsigned int flags
00073     ) :
00074         basic_binary_iprimitive<Archive, Elem, Tr>(
00075             * is.rdbuf(), 
00076             0 != (flags & no_codecvt)
00077         ),
00078         basic_binary_iarchive<Archive>(flags)
00079     {
00080         init(flags);
00081     }
00082 };
00083 
00084 } // namespace archive
00085 } // namespace boost
00086 
00087 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BINARY_IARCHIVE_IMPL_HPP
